author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jiangsu Olive Sensors High-Tech to pay 2017 dividend on April 27
text:
April 20(Reuters) - Jiangsu Olive Sensors High-Tech Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 1.7 yuan per 10 shares (before tax) for 2017, to shareholders of record on April 26
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 27 and the dividend will be paid on April 27
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/bgDcQQ
